trans-unit.source: Manage your Resources in BizTalk Services portal
trans-unit.target: Manage your Resources in BizTalk Services portal

trans-unit.source: View the <token>bridge</token>s, schemas, Transforms, Certificates, and Assemblies used by your application.
trans-unit.target: View the <token>bridge</token>s, schemas, Transforms, Certificates, and Assemblies used by your application.

trans-unit.source: Once you have deployed your <token>msgflow_proj</token>, you can view these items and resources in the <token>tpm_portal</token>.
trans-unit.target: Once you have deployed your <token>msgflow_proj</token>, you can view these items and resources in the <token>tpm_portal</token>.

trans-unit.source: The X12 and AS2 bridges deployed as part of the agreements are also listed here.
trans-unit.target: The X12 and AS2 bridges deployed as part of the agreements are also listed here.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <ui>Resources</ui> tab on the <token>tpm_portal</token> home page to do the following:
trans-unit.target: You can use the <ui>Resources</ui> tab on the <token>tpm_portal</token> home page to do the following:

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="69a4f82d-c339-4780-8761-29f2dd37cd10#BKMK_Schemas" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Schemas</link>: Add EDI schemas (.xsd) to be used by the different message types, like 850-Purchase Order.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="69a4f82d-c339-4780-8761-29f2dd37cd10#BKMK_Schemas" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Schemas</link>: Add EDI schemas (.xsd) to be used by the different message types, like 850-Purchase Order.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="69a4f82d-c339-4780-8761-29f2dd37cd10#BKMK_Trfm" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Transforms</link>: Add <token>transform</token>s (.trfm) created by the <token>msgflow_proj</token> developer to manipulate customer data.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="69a4f82d-c339-4780-8761-29f2dd37cd10#BKMK_Trfm" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Transforms</link>: Add <token>transform</token>s (.trfm) created by the <token>msgflow_proj</token> developer to manipulate customer data.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="69a4f82d-c339-4780-8761-29f2dd37cd10#BKMK_Certs" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Certificates</link>: Upload and store SSL certificates added when configuring a partner, partner profile, and AS2.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="69a4f82d-c339-4780-8761-29f2dd37cd10#BKMK_Certs" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Certificates</link>: Upload and store SSL certificates added when configuring a partner, partner profile, and AS2.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="69a4f82d-c339-4780-8761-29f2dd37cd10#BKMK_Assembly" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Assemblies</link>: Add user assemblies that are used within transforms.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="69a4f82d-c339-4780-8761-29f2dd37cd10#BKMK_Assembly" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Assemblies</link>: Add user assemblies that are used within transforms.

trans-unit.source: Bridges
trans-unit.target: Bridges

trans-unit.source: From the <token>tpm_portal</token>, select the <embeddedLabel>Bridges</embeddedLabel> tab.
trans-unit.target: From the <token>tpm_portal</token>, select the <embeddedLabel>Bridges</embeddedLabel> tab.

trans-unit.source: You can:
trans-unit.target: You can:

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Search for a <token>bridge</token></embeddedLabel> – If you have a lot of <token>bridge</token>s deployed, the list can run into pages.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Search for a <token>bridge</token></embeddedLabel> – If you have a lot of <token>bridge</token>s deployed, the list can run into pages.

trans-unit.source: You can search for a <token>bridge</token> by typing the name of the <token>bridge</token> in the <embeddedLabel>Search</embeddedLabel> text box.
trans-unit.target: You can search for a <token>bridge</token> by typing the name of the <token>bridge</token> in the <embeddedLabel>Search</embeddedLabel> text box.

trans-unit.source: The search results are instantaneous and display the names that match the search string you enter.
trans-unit.target: The search results are instantaneous and display the names that match the search string you enter.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Delete a <token>bridge</token></embeddedLabel> – To delete a <token>bridge</token>, select the <token>bridge</token>, and then select <embeddedLabel>Delete</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Delete a <token>bridge</token></embeddedLabel> – To delete a <token>bridge</token>, select the <token>bridge</token>, and then select <embeddedLabel>Delete</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Deleting the bridge does not delete the artifacts associated with the bridge, or other bridges that this bridge is associated to.
trans-unit.target: Deleting the bridge does not delete the artifacts associated with the bridge, or other bridges that this bridge is associated to.

trans-unit.source: Schemas
trans-unit.target: Schemas

trans-unit.source: To add a schema, go to the <token>tpm_portal</token> home page and select <ui>Resources</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To add a schema, go to the <token>tpm_portal</token> home page and select <ui>Resources</ui>.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel>Schemas</embeddedLabel> tab, select <ui>Upload</ui> to browse to the schema (.xsd).
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel>Schemas</embeddedLabel> tab, select <ui>Upload</ui> to browse to the schema (.xsd).

trans-unit.source: If another schema with the same file name is uploaded at the same location, you get a warning message and depending on the option you chose, the second schema overwrites the first schema.
trans-unit.target: If another schema with the same file name is uploaded at the same location, you get a warning message and depending on the option you chose, the second schema overwrites the first schema.

trans-unit.source: When the schemas are added, the schema can be specified as the <ui>Message Type</ui> in the X12 General Settings (<link xlink:href="8a52d83c-900a-4ec8-ae3d-44328059f6b3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create an X12 Agreement in Azure BizTalk Services</link>) and the AS2 General Settings (<link xlink:href="c437391b-9a64-4a18-bd8d-fc551be72bd4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create an AS2 Agreement in Azure BizTalk Services</link>).
trans-unit.target: When the schemas are added, the schema can be specified as the <ui>Message Type</ui> in the X12 General Settings (<link xlink:href="8a52d83c-900a-4ec8-ae3d-44328059f6b3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create an X12 Agreement in Azure BizTalk Services</link>) and the AS2 General Settings (<link xlink:href="c437391b-9a64-4a18-bd8d-fc551be72bd4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create an AS2 Agreement in Azure BizTalk Services</link>).

trans-unit.source: Schemas can be customized in the Schema Editor.
trans-unit.target: Schemas can be customized in the Schema Editor.

trans-unit.source: To use the Schema Editor:
trans-unit.target: To use the Schema Editor:

trans-unit.source: Open a <token>af_integration</token> project in <token>vsprvs</token>.
trans-unit.target: Open a <token>af_integration</token> project in <token>vsprvs</token>.

trans-unit.source: Add an existing schema (.xsd) or add a new schema (.xsd) to the project.
trans-unit.target: Add an existing schema (.xsd) or add a new schema (.xsd) to the project.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the project and select <ui>Add</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the project and select <ui>Add</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Select <ui>Existing Item</ui> to add a schema that is already created.
trans-unit.target: Select <ui>Existing Item</ui> to add a schema that is already created.

trans-unit.source: To create a new schema, select <ui>New Item</ui> and then select <ui>Schema</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To create a new schema, select <ui>New Item</ui> and then select <ui>Schema</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Select <ui>Add</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Select <ui>Add</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the schema (.xsd) to open the Schema Editor.
trans-unit.target: Double-click the schema (.xsd) to open the Schema Editor.

trans-unit.source: At this point, records, attributes, elements and groups can be added.
trans-unit.target: At this point, records, attributes, elements and groups can be added.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Developing EDI Schemas</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=248181</linkUri></externalLink> provides information on creating and modifying existing schemas.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Developing EDI Schemas</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=248181</linkUri></externalLink> provides information on creating and modifying existing schemas.

trans-unit.source: Transforms
trans-unit.target: Transforms

trans-unit.source: To add a <token>transform</token> (.trfm), go to the <token>tpm_portal</token> home page and select <ui>Resources</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To add a <token>transform</token> (.trfm), go to the <token>tpm_portal</token> home page and select <ui>Resources</ui>.

trans-unit.source: In the <token>transform</token>s tab, select <ui>Upload</ui> and select your <token>transform</token> file (.trfm).
trans-unit.target: In the <token>transform</token>s tab, select <ui>Upload</ui> and select your <token>transform</token> file (.trfm).

trans-unit.source: If another transform with the same file name is uploaded at the same location, you get a warning message and depending on the option you chose, the second transform overwrites the first transform.
trans-unit.target: If another transform with the same file name is uploaded at the same location, you get a warning message and depending on the option you chose, the second transform overwrites the first transform.

trans-unit.source: <token>transform</token>s can also be added when configuring an agreement.
trans-unit.target: <token>transform</token>s can also be added when configuring an agreement.

trans-unit.source: Certificates
trans-unit.target: Certificates

trans-unit.source: The Certificates tab enables you to view as well as upload certificates.
trans-unit.target: The Certificates tab enables you to view as well as upload certificates.

trans-unit.source: To see the added certificates, go to the <token>tpm_portal</token> home page and select <ui>Resources</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To see the added certificates, go to the <token>tpm_portal</token> home page and select <ui>Resources</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Select the <ui>Certificates</ui> tab to see the certificates that have been added.
trans-unit.target: Select the <ui>Certificates</ui> tab to see the certificates that have been added.

trans-unit.source: If the certificate with the same thumbprint is uploaded again, you get a warning message and depending on the option you chose, the second certificate overwrites the first certificate.
trans-unit.target: If the certificate with the same thumbprint is uploaded again, you get a warning message and depending on the option you chose, the second certificate overwrites the first certificate.

trans-unit.source: To add a certificate, from the <embeddedLabel>Certificates</embeddedLabel> tab, select <embeddedLabel>Upload</embeddedLabel> and browse to the certificate to be uploaded.
trans-unit.target: To add a certificate, from the <embeddedLabel>Certificates</embeddedLabel> tab, select <embeddedLabel>Upload</embeddedLabel> and browse to the certificate to be uploaded.

trans-unit.source: A trading partner’s public certificate (CertificateName.cer) or your own private certificate (CertificateName.pfx) with the password can be used.
trans-unit.target: A trading partner’s public certificate (CertificateName.cer) or your own private certificate (CertificateName.pfx) with the password can be used.

trans-unit.source: Assemblies
trans-unit.target: Assemblies

trans-unit.source: To add custom user assemblies (.dll) that might be referenced within transforms, go to the <token>tpm_portal</token> home page and select <ui>Resources</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To add custom user assemblies (.dll) that might be referenced within transforms, go to the <token>tpm_portal</token> home page and select <ui>Resources</ui>.

trans-unit.source: In the <ui> Assemblies</ui> tab, select <ui>Upload</ui> and select the user assemblies to be uploaded.
trans-unit.target: In the <ui> Assemblies</ui> tab, select <ui>Upload</ui> and select the user assemblies to be uploaded.

trans-unit.source: Known Issue
trans-unit.target: Known Issue

trans-unit.source: When adding <ui>Resources</ui>, the dialog window may not remember the path previously used to add a resource.
trans-unit.target: When adding <ui>Resources</ui>, the dialog window may not remember the path previously used to add a resource.

trans-unit.source: To remember the previously-used path, try adding the <token>tpm_portal</token> web site to <legacyBold>Trusted Sites</legacyBold> in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: To remember the previously-used path, try adding the <token>tpm_portal</token> web site to <legacyBold>Trusted Sites</legacyBold> in Internet Explorer.
